title: Gohira Degree College
text:
Gohira Degree College () is a private, pass-level <a href="degree%20college">degree college</a> in <a href="Raozan%20Upazila">Raozan Upazila</a>, <a href="Chittagong%20District">Chittagong District</a>, Bangladesh. It was founded in 1968 by writer <a href="Mahbub%20Ul%20Alam%20Choudhury">Mahbub Ul Alam Choudhury</a>.
The campus is located on the south side of the <a href="N106%20%28Bangladesh%29">Chittagong-Rangamati Highway</a> in Gohira. The college sports ground was selected as the site for the construction of Sheikh Russell Mini Stadium in 2017. Another project underway is the construction of a <a href="Bangladeshi%20taka">BDT</a> 12.1 million (US$150,000) four-story information technology building, as of 2017.
The college transitioned to an online admissions process in 2015.
